Pre-Game Insights: India have won 13 T20I series at home in the last five years, and this is their last T20I game before the T20 World Cup in June.
Afghanistan have lost their last five T20I series, and this is their chance to break their T20I duck against India.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is being played at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru, which is known for its run-fests.
Others: The match is the 3rd T20I of the series, and the series is already in India's favor with a 2-0 lead.
